pdf"}], "schemeImageUrl": "", "detailedDescription_md": "Launched on 1st August 2015, the scheme "Pension Scheme for Grade II Deformed Leprosy Patients" is a Pension Scheme by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Government of Tripura. The scheme provides financial assistance of ₹2,000/- per month to Leprosy Patients who are residents of Tripura. The applications are accepted offline.
